paragraphs.content: CoreJava is a desktop app created in Java using the Swing framework, designed specifically to teach the core fundamentals of the Java programming language. We have specifically selected the topics that we believe contribute to the core fundamentals to progress as a Java programmer and on completion of the topics list, you should be in the position to be confident programming your own Java applications from scratch.

Java is an object-oriented high level programming language that is based on the C and C++ programming languages. Java is fast, secure and reliable and is used to develop applications used on desktops, laptops, servers, mobile phones and more!

The platform is owned by the Oracle Corporation and the primary reason for why it is so popular is because it can be run on a wide variety of computing platforms, has a long history (released 1996) and the same code can be executed on various machines and systems.

multipleChoiceQuiz.question: What programming language is Java based on?
multipleChoiceQuiz.feedbackRight: Correct! This is a multiple choice question, these will come up throughout the app.
multipleChoiceQuiz.feedbackWrong: Wrong! Java is based on the C and C++ programming languages. Many people think JavaScript is related to Java because of their similiar names... They actually have many differences.

paragraphs.content: CoreJava combines the traditional element of teaching (textbooks) with interactive elements to create the ultimate teaching tool for learning Java. You will be able to access quizzes, examples, images and much more to aid you in your journey to become a proficient Java programmer.

trueFalseQuiz.question: True or false: CoreJava is created in Java.
trueFalseQuiz.feedbackRight: Correct! This is a true or false type question - you can either pick true or false.
trueFalseQuiz.feedbackWrong: Wrong! CoreJava is created in Java using the Swing library.

paragraphs.content: To get started, just click on any of the topics from the left! Select a topic based on your experience and comfort with programming in Java. It is recommended that you start from the beginning if you are new to Java or if you want to refresh your memory on the fundamentals of Java.

openChoiceQuiz.question: What programming language are you ready to start learning?
openChoiceQuiz.feedbackRight: Awesome! This is an open choice type question - you can pick any answer you want!
openChoiceQuiz.feedbackWrong: This tool simplifies learning Java so don't be worried! Keep going and you'll see!
